title: Republicans, Don’t Dismiss Bernie Sanders | Guest: Sara A. Carter | 2/25/20
description:
The time has come that Glenn warned us about 15 years ago: We don’t recognize our country! Meanwhile, Harvey Weinstein may be guilty of rape, but was the case was tainted by mob mentality? Podcast host Sara A. Carter discusses the latest on Obama-era whistleblower Philip Haney’s “suicide”: she saw no signs of depression, and even the police admit his chest wound is unusual. And Bernie Sanders is projected to win all but two Super Tuesday states. Republicans beware! Even the coronavirus could shift votes toward Bernie! The Heartland Institute’s Justin Haskins reviews a 1980s article providing more evidence that Sanders is an all-out communist. And while Trump asks for more funds to fight the coronavirus, AI might find a vaccine.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
